results.title: Simvastatin exerts antifibrotic effect and potentiates the antischistosomal effects of praziquantel in a murine model: Role of IL10.
results.text_hl: Previous studies on @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ use in experimental @<m>DISEASE_Schistosomiasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012552 @@@schistosomiasis@@@ in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ did not provide a full explanation of its mechanism as antischisome.
